data.title: Good product
data.body: Quality cloth and big enough to tie it however you need to.

data.title: Great head cover!!
data.body: Soft and softened more with the first wash. Really sweat absorbent. Great for blocking sun. Great concealment for night uses. Size is great and nice light weight and breathable... A+ Love it!!!

data.title: Worth the money!
data.body: The 2 pack is the way to go on this product. Great colors and versatility. I am retired from the military and wore these overseas. Now that I am retired, I still work with the military as a contractor and use one every day. It is also great for motorcycling to keep your neck warm in the winter and keep the sweat off in the summer. Great product.

data.title: Versatile
data.body: Great product. Strong material and I like the color, subtle not strong print. Does everything like the ones I wore in the service. Will go nicely with my fall and winter jackets. Will probably get some other colors.

data.title: Not to bad for the price
data.body: Lets start off with it being very comfortable. The material is about right, not to thin and not to thick. i wont be using it in 0 degree weather but it keeps you warm on those chilly mornings. Color is vibrant black and red. overall a good buy for the price.

data.title: Great for Airsort!
data.body: I bought this Product for a couple time use, but this thing was/is soooo durable! I used it for airsoft, it works great!!!

data.title: Nice scarf
data.body: This is a very square piece of fabric and could be used many different ways. I will use it as a scarf, material on back of chair or sofa, table cover, or maybe even the backing to a small quilt. Soft enough and deep coloring to it. Looks like it will last for a while.

data.title: As described
data.body: Very good product and good quality

data.title: Comfortable but way to small for neck scarf
data.body: It’s comfortable but seems delicate and too thin a material. It’s not long enough for me to use as a neck scarf

data.title: support Palestine!
data.body: The 'scarves' are as illustrated and are attractive, useful, and makes a statement.
